description:
Is your voice not feeling right? Then this course is for you! Aspiring singers will probably hear about “warming up the voice.” You may be wondering what it is, how we do it, and if it is even necessary? Because our singing voice is part of our bodies, vocal health is extremely important and in this course we will learn more about how to keep our voices healthy so we can avoid different vocal problems.

Welcome to the musendo singing series. We use a simple but effective process by which you will learn a technique, then we will practice it along with you to building a strong foundation. All of the teaching materials for our lessons were created by leading music pedagogues based off of curriculum used by the Sibelius Academy and other Finnish university music programs.

By the end of this course, you will have a better understanding of vocal health. You will also gain techniques and exercises that you can pick and choose from in case you want to warm up your voice. Let’s get started to a healthier voice!
title: Warming Up Your Singing Voice
